title: Vision 2024
description: Strategic roadmap for company growth. High level objectives for the next two years.

title: Q1 Release
description: Core platform stabilization and features. Includes performance improvements and security patches.

title: Summer Sprint
description: Performance optimization phase targeting DB queries and frontend bundle size.

title: AI Integration
description: Deploying LLMs across internal tools. Evaluation of different model providers (OpenAI / Anthropic).

title: Manager Training
description: Leadership development workshop for newly promoted managers.

title: New Hire Onboarding
description: Batch 1 training program for engineering and product hires.

title: Feedback Cycle
description: Annual performance review and planning. Employee self-assessments and manager syncs.

title: Cloud Migration
description: Moving data centers to AWS. Phase 1: Migration of core API services.

title: Security Audit
description: SOC2 compliance and remediation. External auditing firm review.

title: Network Upgrade
description: Fiber installation across campuses to support 10Gbps internal speeds.

title: Product Launch
description: Official launch of Version 3.0 to the public.

title: New Year Kickoff
description: Company-wide meeting and strategy session for 2024.
